name: Swastik Brahma
content: Expert Profile: Swastik Brahma | Research Directory Swastik Brahma Assoc Professor Rhodes Hall CEAS - Computer Science - 0030 513-556-2988EmailDownload V-Card I am an Associate Professor at UC. My work focuses on the design of secure and efficient networked, information, and social systems, with some of my current work centered on problems in the areas of Cyber-Physical-Social Systems (CPSS), Internet-of-Things (IoT), and human-machine integrated intelligent systems. I serve on the committees of many leading conferences and journals on such topics. My work has been funded by various agencies including the U.S. Army Research Office (ARO), National Science Foundation (NSF), U.S. Air Force Research Laboratory (AFRL), U.S. Army Research Laboratory (ARL), and the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA). I have been a recipient of the prestigious CAREER award from NSF in 2021. Please visit my website (https://homepages.uc.edu/~sbrahma/) for more information.
